item.title: Chat
item.description: /c/Chat on rabbitea.rs https://rabbitea.rs/c/chat Description Relaxed section for discussion and questions about Rabbitea.rs as an instance, technical support, and any other things that don't fit anywhere else. This is also the place to propose new communities for the instance. item.title: World News
item.description: /c/World News on rabbitea.rs https://rabbitea.rs/c/news Description Discuss the daily news. # Rules 1. All links must be from vettable news sources (eg. No tabloids - NY Post,The Sun, etc) 2. Conversations must remain civil and align with the site rules. 3. Submissions must be recent (less than a week old) and must be a specific news article 4. The submitted articles title should exactly match the title on the news site
